## Doris Wang

I am an Economist/Data Scientist at the World Bank South Asia Region Water Team. My primary research interests are in development, water-related issues, impact evaluation and data science. My specialties are quantitative analysis, economic and statiscal modeling, geo-spatial processing and programming.

## Education

University of California, Davis | Davis, CA
PhD in Agricultural Economics and Natural Resources (stopped) | Sept 2010 - June 2013

University of California, San Diego | San Diego, CA
M.A in International Relations | Sept 2008 - June 2010
